title: Hotel Park Royal Club Cala
description: ANY DAY OF THE WEEK from SEPTEMBER through NOVEMBER in a Studio Room with King Bed for 2 People; or $359 in a Fully Equipped VILLA for Up to 4 People.
highlights: Driving distance to some of the best beaches in the east side of Puerto Rico.
